    Subinterfaces of Operation in org.dellroad.dataskin.ops
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    Action<C,R>
    A possibly mutating data access operation.
    interface 
    InstanceAction<T,C,R>
    An action that is configured in the context of a particular target instance.
    interface 
    InstanceOperation<T,C,R>
    An operation that executes in the context of a particular target object.
    interface 
    InstanceQuery<T,C,R>
    A query operation that is configured in the context of a particular target instance.
    interface 
    Query<C,R>
    Read-only data access operation that returns a stream of result items.
    interface 
    StaticAction<C,R>
    An action that is configured outside of the context of any particular target instance.
    interface 
    StaticOperation<C,R>
    An operation that is configured outside of the context of any particular target instance.
    interface 
    StaticQuery<C,R>
    A query operation that is configured outside of the context of any particular target instance.
